title: The Best You is You
description:
Swagu and Perk discuss the reeling New York Knicks and Julius Randle's disappointing season, why Joe Burrow will be the face of the NFL one day, the reason why there aren't enough black coaches in the NFL, and Rihanna's pregnancy. Let's get it!
